data.text:
@Jpana75 @veryluckyphil @AussieVal10 You have a great sense of humour…

I luv it 😂😂
@MatthewPachari1 @Adam39028289 @veryluckyphil Spot on. Many trials have proven this too!
@veryluckyphil @AussieVal10 Shouldn’t they be in the nappy aisle?

@veryluckyphil 99% of people around the world wore the top two plus weren't protecting their eyes. Give me a f**king break. They were only used as vertue singling devices just so people can FEEL safe. If you think those mask stops an airborne virus thank my underwear can stop a fart. https://t.co/Z65AZ4rfZE

@Ravens_Ledge @veryluckyphil The future will most likely be sustainable off-grid communities bartering exchange of goods and services. After cash or digital money is abolished. Some things are worth fighting for, some not so much and cash is a grey area.

@Ravens_Ledge @veryluckyphil ...Although it's up to us what comes out of the ashes. The people's world, not their new world order. You know how Greece got through their bankruptcy to IMF? They bartered their way through, probably not still out of the woods but prevented the country going more downhill.

@Ravens_Ledge @veryluckyphil I think you've got me mixed up. I see your point in fighting this particular agenda and changes. Also hope you see the point I'm making too. The economy and financial system is broken, never really worked. They want it gone, a lot of us want it gone....
